title: mic problem
content: The microphone in one of my Pixel2 Google amrtphone is dead. only when I use the Loudspeaker the other side can hear my voice. I followed your instructions and try to isolate the problem through Safe Mode state but the problem still exist. we don't have anyone in ISRAEL who gives service fot this device so we simply dont know how to deal with this problem. if it possible we won't object replacing our device with a newrer one within trade off transaction. we would like to hear your advice regard to all issues raised hereabove. Regards, Joseph Eshed, Israel.
